details.text: Platform interface logic.
Global interconnect for 5 global loads and 4 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
See %L for more information

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: Number of compute units: 1
Kernel dispatch logic.
Type: Register
1 register of width 32 and depth 1

details.Clock: Running memory at 2x clock to support more concurrent ports

Additional information.text: Requested size 2048 bytes, implemented size 4096 bytes, replicated 2 times total, stall-free, 8 reads and 3 writes.
Replicated 2 times to efficiently support multiple accesses. To reduce this replication factor, reduce number of read and write accesses.

details.text: Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

details.Additional information: Requested size 65536 bytes, implemented size 65536 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.

Logic required to efficiently support sets of operations that do not stall. This area cannot be affected directly.

Load uses a Semi-streaming LSU.  Load with a private 512 kilobit cache. Cache is not shared with any other load. It is flushed on kernel start. Use Dynamic Profiler to verify cache effectiveness. Other kernels should not be updating the data in global memory while this kernel is using it. Cache is created when memory access pattern is data-dependent or appears to be repetitive. Simplify access pattern or mark pointer as 'volatile' to disable generation of this cache.
Store uses a Local-pipelined never-stall LSU
Stall-free write to memory declared on Ising-kernel.cl:16.
